query:
INSERT INTO plt_events (
                id,
                transaction_index,
                event_type,
                token_module_type,
                token_index,
                token_event,
                event_timestamp,
                amount_value,
                amount_decimals
            )
            VALUES (
                (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(id) + 1, 0) FROM plt_events),
                $1,
                 $2,
                 $3,
                (SELECT index FROM plt_tokens WHERE token_id = $4),
                $5,
                (SELECT slot_time from blocks WHERE height = (SELECT block_height FROM transactions WHERE index = $1)), 
                $6,
                $7)
